description: In response to a Supreme Court recommendation, the Health Ministry has established four sub-groups to draft safety protocols for healthcare professionals. These groups will concentrate on improving medical infrastructure, security systems, working conditions, and legal frameworks. Their recommendations are expected within three weeks for further review by the National Task Force.
title: 4 sub-groups to formulate hosp safety protocol

description: In Kolkata, actors and celebrities supporting protests for justice for the raped and murdered RG Kar doctor encounter public backlash. Rituparna Sengupta was heckled, with her car attacked during a protest. Filmmaker Aparna Sen also faced criticism, revealing tensions between celebrities and the public in these movements.
title: Celebs face public ire, accused of joining protests for publicity

description: The demolition of a rest room and staff toilet at R G Kar Medical College & Hospital was ordered by then principal Sandip Ghosh, one day after a PGT doctor was found raped and murdered. The timing has raised suspicions among junior doctors and CBI investigators about potential tampering with the crime scene.
title: Day after rape-murder, Ghosh ordered demolition at RG Kar

description: Protests seeking justice for the rape and murder of a postgraduate doctor at Kolkata's RG Kar Medical College were disrupted by hooliganism and drunken attacks. Women participants faced assaults, resulting in arrests and property damage. Demonstrations occurred in Kanchrapara, Barasat, Garia, and Jadavpur.
title: Drunken attacks, molestation mar 'Reclaim the Night' rallies

description: The citizens' protests in Kolkata against the brutal rape-murder of an RG Kar junior doctor have reached their fifth week. These unprecedented, apolitical demonstrations have seen significant participation, driven by public anger and a sense of shared vulnerability. Social media has played a key role in sustaining this movement, surprising even seasoned observers.
title: Citizens’ protests, fuelled by anger and social media, enter fifth week

description: The BJP in Haryana is experiencing a major internal revolt following the announcement of its first list of 67 candidates for the assembly elections. Multiple leaders, including current ministers and MLAs, have either resigned or opted to contest independently after being denied tickets. The party is attempting to address their concerns.
title: Haryana mantri quits, MLA joins Congress as BJP's 1st list sparks revolt

description: The BJP has released its list of star campaigners for the Jammu and Kashmir assembly elections, featuring prominent leaders like PM Modi, Amit Shah, and Rajnath Singh. Amit Shah will unveil the party's manifesto on Friday and hold meetings with state BJP members to discuss election strategies. Voting begins on September 18.
title: PM Modi, Amit Shah among BJP's 40 star campaigners in J&K

description: Telegram CEO Pavel Durov addressed his recent arrest in France, calling the charges misguided. He criticized using outdated laws to hold him accountable for third-party actions on Telegram. Durov emphasized Telegram's commitment to content moderation and cooperation with regulators, rejecting claims that the platform is a haven for criminal activities.
title: Telegram not 'anarchic paradise': What Durov said in first statement after arrest

description: The Kerala High Court has established a special division bench to consider petitions related to the Justice K Hema Committee report on women's working conditions in the film industry. The report, partially disclosed recently, exposes serious concerns about sexual exploitation and neglect of women's rights. Various petitions call for criminal proceedings and additional investigations based on the report's conclusions.
title: HC forms special bench to hear petitions on Hema panel report

description: A popular actor from the 90s has accused a well-known Tamil director of grooming her as a sex slave and subjecting her to mental, physical, and sexual abuse. The abuse started when she was 18 during her debut film shoot. She plans to disclose the director's name to Kerala's special investigation team.
title: Director called me ‘daughter’, raped me for a year: Kerala actor

description: Four defence personnel, including a junior commissioned officer, died after their truck plunged into a gorge on the Rhenock-Rongli state highway in Sikkim. The accident happened Thursday morning as they traveled from Bengal's Pedong to Zuluk. An investigation is underway to determine the exact sequence of events leading to this tragedy.
title: 4 jawans die as Army truck falls into gorge

description: The National Medical Commission (NMC) is turning down patient appeals against state medical council decisions based on the NMC Act, 2019. This action continues despite a recent notification affirming the Indian Medical Council Regulations, 2002 that allow patients to appeal. Critics argue this practice is unlawful and urge health ministry intervention.
title: Despite notice, NMC rejects patient appeals against state council orders

description: In Rajasthan, tension erupted at a private school when teachers discovered a gun in a Class VIII student's bag during routine checks. The student had brought his grandfather's licensed firearm to impress classmates. Police have filed an FIR against the grandfather for improper weapon security, and further investigations are ongoing.
title: Gun found in Rajasthan student's bag, FIR filed against his grandfather

description: The Allahabad High Court determined that poker and rummy are games of skill rather than gambling. The court ordered authorities to review their decision denying a gaming license to M/S Dm Gaming Pvt Ltd, stressing the necessity for solid evidence instead of conjecture in making such judgments.
title: Poker and rummy games of skill, not gambling, says Allahabad HC

description: The Bombay High Court has reunited a 23-year-old B-Pharm graduate with her husband, who is a driver educated up to the seventh standard, despite parental objections. Emphasizing the woman's autonomy, the court ordered police protection for the couple to ensure their safe return home.
title: HC reunites B.Pharm grad with driver hubby despite family objection

description: Security forces engaged in a 40-minute gunfight with alleged Maoists in Telangana's Bhadradri Kothagudem district, killing six individuals, including two women. The encounter near the Chhattisgarh border also injured two Greyhounds commandos. Authorities recovered weapons and ammunition from the site. This follows a similar operation in Chhattisgarh where nine Maoists were recently killed.
title: 2 women among 6 Reds killed in Telangana encounter

description: Congress has raised serious concerns about Sebi chairperson Madhabi Puri Buch's objectivity, citing reports of her dual employment during her ICICI Bank tenure. Allegations include conflicts of interest and a toxic work environment at Sebi. An impartial inquiry into these charges has been demanded by Congress officials.
title: Congress intensifies push for probe into charges against Sebi chief

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi noted that access to proper toilets is crucial for reducing infant and child mortality. He referenced research from 'Nature' indicating that the Swachh Bharat Mission may have prevented 60,000 to 70,000 infant deaths annually. Since its launch in 2014, the mission has dramatically increased toilet construction and improved public health across India.
title: Good sanitation 'game changer' for public health, says PM Modi

description: PM Narendra Modi invited leading Singaporean business leaders to consider investing in India, presenting it as a robust alternative for supply chains. He emphasized India's recent progress and upcoming infrastructure projects across multiple sectors. Modi also revealed plans to establish an Invest India office in Singapore.
title: Invest in infra sector, aviation in India: PM Modi woos Singapore Inc

description: CBI chief Praveen Sood announced that Interpol issued a record 100 Red Notices last year on India's request. Union home secretary Govind Mohan stressed the importance of international police cooperation due to transnational crime. The CBI handled 17,368 international assistance requests in 2023 and joined Interpol's Global Academy Network.
title: Interpol issued highest ever 100 Red Notices last year on India's request: CBI

description: In Varanasi's Lallapura neighborhood, artisans specialize in crafting military badges and regimental insignias for global armed forces using gold and silver threads. Their work is valued by clients such as British royals. The craft received a boost with a Geographical Indication tag in 2014 and also caters to fashion houses.
title: Made in Varanasi's lanes, for royals and militaries abroad

description: The Indian armed forces are preparing to adopt additional measures to remove colonial-era influences and embrace indigenous customs. This initiative was highlighted during a joint commanders' conference where Defence Minister Rajnath Singh released a publication on the subject. However, some military officers express concerns that these efforts could divert focus from threats posed by China and Pakistan.
title: Forces poised to shed more 'vestiges of colonial era'

description: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh has called on the Indian armed forces to develop a joint military vision in preparation for future challenges. He emphasized fail-proof deterrence and learning from ongoing global conflicts. Singh also stressed the importance of integration among the Army, IAF, and Navy for swift, proportionate responses to provocations.
title: Rajnath pushes for ‘joint military vision’ to tackle global challenges

description: A 28-year-old footwear trader from Beed was assaulted by self-proclaimed cow vigilantes who suspected him of being a cow transporter. The attack happened after he saw a vehicle hit a stray cow and tried to photograph it. Police have arrested four out of the eight men involved in the incident.
title: Mistaken for cow transporter, man thrashed in Maharashtra

description: Rahul Gandhi has demanded that PM Narendra Modi apologize not only for the collapse of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's statue but also for demonetisation, flawed GST implementation, and damaging small and medium-scale industries. Speaking in Sangli district, he accused the Modi government of prioritizing industrialists like Adani and Ambani over solving unemployment issues.
title: Uddhav, senior party aides skip Rahul Gandhi’s public event in Maharashtra

description: The National Medical Commission has pulled back the Competency Based Medical Education Guidelines, 2024, due to controversy over reintroduced topics like 'sodomy and lesbianism' as unnatural offences. Other outdated medico-legal subjects were also included. The NMC will revise and release updated guidelines soon.
title: NMC junks order labelling sodomy and lesbianism as offences

description: The BJP-led Assam cabinet has accepted most recommendations from a commission to safeguard Assamese people's rights, including land rights restrictions and reserving 80% of assembly seats for Assamese people. The state aims to implement these by April next year, with further consultations planned for the remaining suggestions.
title: Himanta government accepts report on safeguards for ‘Assamese’

description: NIA has chargesheeted Inderpal Singh Gaba, an Indian-origin UK national, for his role in last year's violent protests at the Indian High Commission in London. The protests were organized to support Amritpal Singh, chief of pro-Khalistan outfit Waaris Punjab De. Gaba was arrested on April 25 after being detained earlier by Indian immigration authorities.
title: UK national chargesheeted for high commission stir

description: In Pilibhit, Changez Khan was allegedly assaulted by Sanjay Mishra and his associates. Although hospitalized with serious injuries, Khan faced molestation charges instead of receiving justice. Police later filed an FIR against Mishra and others but made no arrests. Khan's family believes the allegations are baseless.
title: Man thrashed by right-wingers, cops accuse him of molestation

description: In light of the Apalachee High School shooting involving Colt Gray, new information indicates that the FBI had received warnings months earlier. In May 2023, Discord users reported threats against a middle school. Investigations ensued but found no substantial evidence connecting Gray or his father to these threats, leading to case closure.
title: Georgia shooting: Did FBI know about Apalachee High School shooter beforehand?

description: In Shimla's Sanjauli market, protesters demanded the demolition of a mosque alleged to be illegally constructed and housing illegal immigrants. PWD minister Vikramaditya Singh assured that action would be taken if the building is found illegal. The case is under review by the municipal commissioner's court, with a hearing scheduled for Sept 7.
title: Protests erupt over alleged illegal mosque in Shimla

description: The Enforcement Directorate has attached Rs 55 crore assets, including a hotel, bungalow, and luxury vehicles, from expelled DMK functionary Jaffer Sadiq in Chennai. Accused of running a drug cartel and laundering proceeds through shell entities, Sadiq was arrested along with his brother for smuggling pseudoephedrine and ketamine to foreign countries.
title: ED seizes Rs 55cr assets of expelled DMK functionary in drug case

description: A seven-year-old student in Amroha was expelled for bringing biryani to school. A viral video showed his mother arguing with the principal, who made derogatory remarks about their Muslim background. Authorities are investigating, and the Amroha Muslim Committee has demanded strict action against the principal.
title: UP school expels Class III kid for bringing non-veg tiffin

description: Bangladesh has lodged a formal protest with India regarding the alleged shooting of a 13-year-old Bangladeshi girl by the Border Security Force near the India-Bangladesh border on September 1, 2024. The incident occurred as she and her parents attempted to cross into Tripura. Bangladesh condemned this act and expressed deep concern.
title: Bangladesh denies its forces shot minor girl, blames BSF

description: M Arun Rangarajan, a suspended Karnataka cadre IPS officer, was arrested after setting his house on fire in Gobichettipalayam. He allegedly assaulted his live-in partner Sujatha, a former sub-inspector. Previously suspended for attacking her, Rangarajan had been residing with his parents since February.
title: Accused of assault by ex, IPS man torches house in suicide bid, held

description: M Arun Rangarajan, a suspended Karnataka cadre IPS officer, was arrested after setting his house on fire in Gobichettipalayam. He allegedly assaulted his live-in partner Sujatha, a former sub-inspector. Previously suspended for attacking her, Rangarajan had been residing with his parents since February.
title: Accused of assault by ex, IPS man torches house in suicide bid, held

description: The Nagpur bench of Bombay high court granted anticipatory bail to Nitin Bode, an insurance agent accused of promoting Naxalism via provocative WhatsApp messages. The court's decision was based on the absence of demonstrated intent to create unrest or pose an immediate threat to public order, despite accusations from Yavatmal anti-terrorist squad.
title: Pre-arrest bail for man ‘who promoted Naxalism on WA’

description: The Rajasthan High Court has granted bail to Mohammed Javed, charged as a key conspirator in the beheading of Udaipur tailor Kanhaiya Lal. The court mandated conditions including a bail bond and cooperation with the ongoing NIA investigation. This follows an earlier bail granted to another accused in September 2023.
title: Key conspirator in Rajasthan tailor beheading gets bail from high court

description: The Rajasthan High Court has granted bail to Mohammed Javed, charged as a key conspirator in the beheading of Udaipur tailor Kanhaiya Lal. The court mandated conditions including a bail bond and cooperation with the ongoing NIA investigation. This follows an earlier bail granted to another accused in September 2023.
title: Key conspirator in Rajasthan tailor beheading gets bail from high court

description: Former Indian cricketer Vinod Kambli has updated fans on his health following concerns from a viral video showing him struggling to walk. In a recent clip, Kambli assured everyone that he is 'fit and fine.' The initial footage had sparked speculation about his condition, leading fans to call for support from Sachin Tendulkar.
title: Once struggling to walk properly, Kambli gives health update

description: A bus en route from Pratapgarh to Delhi overturned in Kanakha, Mohanlalganj, causing injuries to six passengers, including a four-year-old girl. The accident took place around 11 pm when the high-speed bus lost control and collided with a car. Police and locals promptly initiated rescue operations, freeing those trapped and transporting the injured to nearby hospitals.
title: Six sustain injuries as bus overturns in Mohanlalganj on car

description: A tragic incident in Amreli, Gujarat saw a grandmother charged with murder after biting her one-year-old grandson who later succumbed to his injuries. The event took place on September 3 when the child wouldn't stop crying. Initially classified as an accidental death, a postmortem revealed bite marks, prompting police to take action.
title: Infant dies after grandmom bites, kicks him in fit of rage

description: National Conference vice president Omar Abdullah has filed nomination papers for Budgam and Ganderbal constituencies in the J&K assembly elections. His move to contest from two seats drew criticism from opponents citing lack of confidence. This election is notable as it is the first since Article 370 was revoked and J&K was bifurcated into Union territories.
title: After Ganderbal, Omar Abdullah files nomination from Budgam

description: J&K Congress president Tariq Hameed Karra rejected BJP's Ram Madhav's allegations that former militants are helping NC and PDP in the assembly elections. Karra claimed BJP is turning to ex-militants due to insufficient support from “right-thinking people” and warned voters about independent candidates supported by certain parties to split votes.
title: Ram Madhav unaware of ex-militants in BJP: Congress J&K chief

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to invigorate BJP’s election campaign in Jammu and Kashmir with three major rallies next week. Two rallies are planned for Jammu, and one for Srinagar. Home minister Amit Shah will also visit the region to support BJP candidates and supporters during his two-day visit to Jammu on September 6-7.
title: PM Modi to boost BJP’s J&K poll campaign next week with 3 rallies

description: A 14-year-old boy faces charges for the murder of Bhim Kohli, an 80-year-old British Indian man attacked while walking his dog in Leicester. Kohli died from neck injuries sustained during the assault. Three girls and another boy were also arrested but subsequently released without further police action.
title: Teen charged with murder of British Indian, 80, at Leicester park

description: Indian para-athletes continue their quest for glory on Day 9 of the Paris Paralympics, transitioning from the powerlifting arena to the track and field. With more medal events scheduled, these athletes are aiming for the top spot of their respective disciplines.
title: Paris Paralympics, September 6: India's Full Schedule

description: India and Singapore have elevated their bilateral ties to a comprehensive strategic partnership. Prime Ministers Narendra Modi and Lawrence Wong signed four MoUs covering areas like semiconductors, healthcare, skill development, and digitisation. They underscored the significance of regional security, peaceful dispute resolution, and cooperation in advanced manufacturing.
title: Eye on China, India & Singapore talk SCS, Quad; chip deal to boost ties

description: Donald Trump announced his intention to appoint Elon Musk as head of a new government efficiency commission if he wins the upcoming presidential election. The commission will conduct a financial and performance audit of the federal government, focusing on eliminating fraud and improper payments within six months, potentially saving trillions of dollars.
title: Elon to head new 'efficiency commission,' says Trump —promising to save US 'trillions'
'Faulty Covid jabs ... ': J'khand CM hints at conspiracy behind death of 12 constable aspirants

description: Swedish telecom giant Telia is set to cut approximately 15% of its workforce as part of a cost-saving initiative aimed at reducing annual expenses by 2.6 billion Swedish crowns. CEO Patrik Hofbauer highlighted the necessity of this decision for the company's long-term success, with job cuts affecting employees both in Sweden and internationally.
title: Sweden's biggest telecom company is cutting 3,000 jobs; here's what CEO said

description: A 14-year-old boy has been charged with murdering Bhim Kohli, an 80-year-old man attacked while walking his dog in Braunstone. Kohli died from a neck injury. The boy appeared in youth court and will face Leicester Crown Court. Four other children were initially arrested but later released without charge.
title: Bhim Sen Kohli murder: Teen charged with killing 80-yr-old in UK

description: The National Investigation Agency has chargesheeted Inderpal Singh Gaba, an Indian-origin UK national, for his involvement in last year's violent protests at the Indian High Commission in London. The protests supported pro-Khalistan leader Amritpal Singh after a police crackdown on his group, Waaris Punjab De. Gaba was detained and interrogated by NIA before being charged.
title: NIA chargesheets UK national over violent protests at Indian High Commission in London

description: Hunter Biden, son of President Joe Biden, has pleaded guilty in his ongoing tax evasion case just before jury selection began. This follows a collapsed plea deal from 2023. The prosecution is focusing on allegations of tax evasion and failure to file returns, while the defense highlights Biden's personal struggles.
title: Hunter Biden offers 'Alford' plea in tax case: What does it mean?

description: The Uttarakhand High Court has instructed the central government to disclose empanelment documents to IFS officer Sanjiv Chaturvedi. This landmark decision follows Chaturvedi's petition for transparency in the usually opaque empanelment process. The court clarified that only records related to Chaturvedi's own empanelment are to be provided.
title: Give empanelment papers to officer, HC tells central government

description: Historian Allan Lichtman, renowned for accurately predicting nine out of ten US presidential elections, forecasts Kamala Harris as the next President. Using his '13 keys' system developed in 1981, Lichtman claims Harris holds eight favorable keys compared to Trump's three. Current polls indicate a narrow lead for Harris within the margin of error.
title: Election 'Nostradamus' says Kamala will be next US President

description: The National Medical Commission has officially withdrawn the Competency-Based Medical Education Curriculum Guidelines for 2024 due to protests from transgender and disability rights groups. These groups argued that the guidelines were discriminatory. The NMC plans to revise and update these guidelines at a later date to address these concerns.
title: NMC cancels regressive CBME guidelines, revised framework to be out soon: Official notice

description: Taslima Nasreen warns that Islamic radicals are trying to make Bangladesh another Afghanistan with anti-India, anti-Hindu, and pro-Pakistan propaganda. She expressed concerns over violent protests targeting Hindus and criticized Sheikh Hasina's autocratic rule. Nasreen also highlighted difficulties in renewing her Indian resident permit, which expired on July 27.
title: 'Anti-India, pro-Pak': Islamic radicals want to make B'desh another Afghanistan, warns Taslima

description: Severe flooding in Andhra Pradesh due to heavy rainfall has submerged roads and houses. Relief efforts by NDRF, central forces, and local officials are ongoing. Helicopters deliver essential supplies. Chief Minister Naidu and Union Minister Chouhan have assessed the situation, ensuring all possible measures for relief are being implemented.
title: Chandrababu Naidu, Shivraj Singh Chouhan visit Andhra amid severe flooding

description: Ganesh Chaturthi falls on September 7 this year with preparations already in motion to welcome the jolly and adorable Lord of happiness, joy, and fortune. To spread the message of peace and delight with your loved ones, here are some Ganesh Chaturthi wishes, messages, quotes, and images for you to share with your loved ones.
title: Ganesh Chaturthi 2024: Best messages, quotes, wishes and images to share

description: Two college students in Bengaluru had a distressing encounter when an autorickshaw driver verbally abused and slapped one of them after she cancelled his ride using a mobile app. The incident took place on a busy road and was recorded on video, which has since gone viral. The driver was arrested by Magadi Road police.
title: Ola auto driver slaps student for cancelling ride, held

description: The US Justice Department has charged two Russian media executives with laundering $10 million to fund pro-Moscow propaganda videos distributed by a Tennessee-based company. These videos, which have amassed millions of views, aim to create social divisions in the US and blame Ukraine for the ongoing war with Russia. Moscow dismissed these allegations as nonsense.
title: Mind Games: Putin says he prefers Harris as prez; Democrats claim Moscow manipulating MAGA

description: Kapil Parmar won India's first Paralympic judo medal, clinching bronze in the men's 60kg (J1) category in Paris by defeating Brazil's Elielton de Oliveira with a score of 10-0. Previously, he secured a silver medal at the 2022 Asian Games and overcame Venezuela's Marco Dennis Blanco in the quarterfinals.
title: Kapil wins historic judo bronze for India at Paralympics

description: The dispute originated when Brazil's Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes took a stand against Musk's social media platform, X (formerly Twitter). The judge accused X of failing to moderate content that allegedly incited violence and spread misinformation, particularly following the unrest associated with supporters of former president Jair Bolsonaro. In April 2024, de Moraes included Musk and X in the ongoing "Digital Militias Inquiry," an investigation aimed at combating online misinformation. The judge accused Musk of reactivating blocked profiles without court approval and obstructing judicial efforts to regulate online content.
title: Explained: Why did Brazil ban Elon Musk's X?

description: Nvidia shares have seen a sharp decline of 20% since June, including a significant 9.5% drop recently. The fall is driven by regulatory scrutiny from the US Department of Justice, underwhelming quarterly forecasts, and investor skepticism about the AI boom's immediate benefits. Weakness in the broader chip sector has also impacted Nvidia.
title: 4 big reasons behind Nvidia's $279 bn loss in one day, biggest-ever for a US company

description: Amazon is redirecting its focus from China to India by increasing exports of small, low-priced items from India to $5 billion this year. Collaborating with India's commerce ministry and trade associations, Amazon aims to connect with small manufacturers providing textiles, jewellery, household items, and Ayurveda products. This move underscores India's rising significance in the global supply chain.
title: ‘China out’: Amazon has a ‘$5 billion plan’ for India's small businesses

description: Former Pakistan cricketer Kamran Akmal criticizes the national team management and captains for neglecting spinners in home Test series, attributing this to their recent 0-2 loss to Bangladesh. He stresses the need for consistent opportunities for seasoned spinners and urges players to prioritize domestic cricket over foreign leagues to improve performance.
title: 'When Babar was captain, he never bothered to...'

description: Intel has decided to cancel the development of its 20A process node for Arrow Lake processors and will rely on external manufacturers like TSMC. This decision is part of Intel's cost-cutting measures and restructuring efforts. The company will now focus on developing the more advanced 18A node, scheduled for a 2025 release.
title: Intel is giving up on one of its biggest plans announced years ago

description: Ex-WFI chief Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh has repeated his accusation that Congress leaders Bhupinder and Deepender Hooda conspired against him through last year's wrestler protest. He also implicated wrestler Bajrang Punia. The remarks come after wrestlers Bajrang Punia and Vinesh Phogat met Rahul Gandhi, fueling speculation about their potential candidacy in the Haryana elections.
title: 'I said it... ': Brij Bhushan repeats conspiracy charge against wrestlers, Congress

description: West Bengal Governor CV Ananda Bose has voiced concerns following information from a victim's parents, resulting in prompt action. He criticizes the administration for continuous errors and highlights problems within the police force, including criminal behavior, corruption, and political influence. The governor calls for decisive action to maintain public trust.
title: 'Criminalised, corrupt': Bengal guv slams Kolkata cops over rape-murder case

description: Catch up on today's top 5 entertainment stories! Mukesh Bhatt wins a legal battle over the Aashiqui title against Bhushan Kumar, while Kareena Kapoor tops the list of India's highest tax-paying female celebrities. Mira Rajput celebrates her son Zain's birthday, Jaya Prada shares rare photos with her son, and Ranbir Kapoor and Vicky Kaushal gear up for Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Love & War.
title: Top 5 entertainment news of the day

description: The article presents a list of must-see water displays around the world, featuring both human-made fountains and natural waterfalls. Highlights include the Bellagio Fountains in Las Vegas, Dubai Fountain, Trevi Fountain in Rome, and Iguazu Falls on the Argentina-Brazil border. These attractions offer stunning visual experiences that blend art, technology, and nature.
title: World's 10 most stunning water displays; Fountain of wealth, Dubai fountain & more

description: The West Bengal government has requested opposition parties to avoid politicizing the rape and murder of a trainee doctor at Kolkata's R G Kar Hospital. It also warned the opposition not to put pressure on the victim's family for taking political advantage. The BJP, which has been leading the protests against the TMC government, hit back at chief minister Mamata Banerjee and accused her police of spreading fake news.
title: 'Not the time for vulture politics ... ': Bengal minister slams oppn

description: Sarfaraz Khan's heartfelt celebration for his brother Musheer Khan's century in the Duleep Trophy match was a touching moment. Musheer's unbeaten 105 off 227 balls helped stabilize India B's innings to 202/7 after a top-order collapse. Sarfaraz, despite his own early dismissal, showed immense pride and joy for his sibling's achievement.
title: Watch: Sarfaraz's precious celebration after Musheer ton

description: Shabbir Ahmed, an ex-fast bowler, resigned from his position as a regional coach at the Pakistan Cricket Board due to poor grassroots conditions. He pointed out rampant political interference, favouritism, and nepotism in cricket affairs. Shabbir expressed frustration over talented players being overlooked for selection in favor of those with political connections.
title: 'How can Pakistan cricket improve when...'

description: At the Joint Commanders’ Conference, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh highlighted India's need to be prepared for war to maintain peace. He emphasized joint military vision, modern warfare equipment, and technological advancements in data and AI. Singh also called for analyzing global conflicts and regional instability to anticipate future challenges.
title: 'Be prepared for unexpected': Rajnath Singh tells Armed Forces

description: Mercedes-Benz India has unveiled the Maybach EQS 680 SUV for Rs 2.25 crore, featuring exclusive design and advanced features. The electric SUV boasts a range of up to 611 km with its dual-motor setup and a 107.8 kWh battery pack. This launch expands Mercedes' electric vehicle lineup in India to five models.
title: Mercedes-Maybach EQS 680 electric SUV launched at Rs 2.25 cr: Battery, range, features etc

description: Nirmala Sitharaman says the spirit should be both of the Center and the states working to address tax evasion and improving compliance.
title: No bitterness & friction in Centre-state relationship in tax matters: Nirmala Sitharaman

description: To alleviate debt and enhance state revenue, the Punjab government has increased VAT on petrol by 61 paise per litre and diesel by 92 paise per litre. The subsidised power tariff of Rs 3 per unit for domestic consumers with up to a 7 kW load has also been revoked.
title: Revenue-starved Punjab govt slashes subsidised power tariff, increases VAT on fuels

description: Mukesh Bhatt and Vishesh Bhatt (Managing Director Of Vishesh Films) open up on why they had to fight a legal battle with Bhushan Kumar and T-series to safeguard the 'Aashiqui' brand and not harm it or dilute it.
title: Mukesh Bhatt on legal battle with T-series over 'Aashiqui' title

description: President Emmanuel Macron has named Michel Barnier as France's new prime minister following an indecisive snap election. Barnier faces the challenge of navigating a divided parliament to pass reforms. The far-right National Rally party, holding significant seats, has set conditions for its support, particularly on immigration and voting system changes.
title: Ex-Brexit negotiator Michel Barnier appointed France PM by Prez Macron

description: Jagmeet Singh's New Democratic Party has pulled its support from Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's Liberal government, accusing him of failing to address key issues and yielding to corporate interests. This decision threatens the stability of Trudeau's minority government, which will now need to seek support from other opposition parties to survive until the next election in October 2025.
title: Political crisis in Canada: Jagmeet Singh's NDP pulls out of Trudeau govt

description: After an 8-year hiatus, Aarya Babbar returns to TV as Kalikant Thakur in Jagriti- Ek Nayi Subah. He expressed joy over his brother Prateik Babbar and fiancée Priya Banerjee's forthcoming wedding. The actor is eager to portray a complex, misogynistic character, generating excitement among fans for his new role.
title: Aarya Babbar reacts to brother Prateik Babbar and Priya Banerjee's wedding

description: The Delhi High Court has issued a warning to Wikipedia, threatening to block the site in India over non-compliance with an order related to a defamation case filed by ANI. The court demanded details about editors who made controversial edits on ANI's page, seeking damages and removal of the content.
title: Delhi High Court warns Wikipedia: “If you don't like India…..”

description: India A and India B are clashing in the Duleep Trophy 2024 opener at Bengaluru's M. Chinnaswamy Stadium. Shubman Gill is leading India A, with Abhimanyu Easwaran captaining India B. Gill’s taped-up jersey has drawn attention, likely due to not having his usual '77' jersey or borrowing a teammate’s temporarily. It is worth noting that Shubman has a particular affinity for the number 7.
title: Why is Shubman Gill wearing a taped-up jersey

description: AI-generated posts have raised concerns, with people arguing that it’s impossible to tell if a video is real or a deepfake. Others have argued that videos, like those showing Harris as a “communist dictator” or Trump and Musk dancing to "Stayin’ Alive," are obviously fake and intended to be humorous.
title: From ‘Communist Harris’ to ‘Swifties for Trump’: AI-generated images muddy US Presidential Election 2024

description: The article covers notable WWE families whose legacies are carried forward by their offspring. It includes Dusty Rhodes with Cody Rhodes, Ric Flair with Charlotte Flair, Rick Steiner with Bron Breakker, and Sika Anoa’i with Roman Reigns. These second and third-generation wrestlers are continuing to make a mark in WWE.
title: Famous WWE Families : The Current Generation Of Superstars

description: Rahul Gandhi demanded that PM Modi apologise to Shivaji Maharaj and Maharashtrians for the statue's collapse in Sindhudurg. Speaking at a Sangli event, he stressed respecting historical figures. The incident was caused by strong winds, and the sculptor has been arrested, Eknath Shinde had said. CM Eknath Shinde assured that the statue would be reinstalled. Last week, PM Modi apologised for the collapse of Shivaji Maharaj's statue in Maharashtra's Sindhudurg.
title: 'Apologise not just to Shivaji Maharaj but also ... ': Rahul Gandhi to PM Modi

description: The BJP has made allegations against former RG Kar hospital principal Sandip Ghosh, claiming he ordered renovations a day after a trainee doctor was raped and murdered. They accuse the West Bengal government of covering up evidence and demanded resignations of CM Mamata Banerjee and Kolkata Police Commissioner.
title: Ex-principal Ghosh ordered renovation in hospital day after Kolkata doc rape-murder: BJP

description: The Rajasthan High Court granted bail to Mohammad Javed, accused of conducting reconnaissance in the beheading of tailor Kanhaiya Lal for supporting former BJP spokesperson Nupur Sharma. The murder was carried out by Mohammad Riyaz Attari and Ghouse Mohammed and classified as a terror act by the NIA.
title: Kanhaiya Lal murder case: Rajasthan HC grants bail to one of the accused

description: Munich police shot a suspicious person near the Israeli Consulate and a museum focused on Nazi-era history. The individual was injured, but further details are not available. Police have increased their presence in Germany's third-largest city, although there are no indications of other suspects or incidents elsewhere.
title: Munich police shoot suspicious person near Israeli Consulate

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin indicated a willingness to negotiate peace with Ukraine based on initial agreements from talks in Turkey. Speaking at the Eastern Economic Forum, he suggested China, India, and Brazil as possible mediators. He also addressed Ukraine's incursion into the Kursk region and its effects on the broader conflict.
title: ‘ We have never refused to…’: Putin signals at peace talks with Ukraine, names India among potential ‘mediators’

description: A shooting at Apalachee High School in Winder, Georgia resulted in four deaths and nine injuries. Fourteen-year-old Colt Gray, previously investigated for online threats, is now in custody facing adult murder charges. The community mourns as authorities investigate how he obtained the firearm.
title: Silence before storm: Apalachee High’s dark day

description: Rishabh Pant's much-awaited return to red-ball cricket ended quickly as he was dismissed after facing just 10 balls in the Duleep Trophy match between India A and India B. Shubman Gill, captain of India A, took an outstanding catch running backwards to send Pant back for 7. Pant attempted a shot off pacer Akash Deep but sliced it, leading to his dismissal.
title: Watch: Gill's stunning catch to end Pant's red-ball return

description: Taylor Swift's potential endorsement in the 2024 US presidential election could notably affect voter turnout, especially among younger demographics. Historical evidence suggests celebrity endorsements can significantly impact elections. Recent polls indicate Swift's influence is stronger among Gen Z voters, making her support potentially crucial in swing states.
title: Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris: Can Taylor Swift swing the US presidential polls?

description: The article details the legendary duels between Sachin Tendulkar and Shane Warne during India's 1998 home series against Australia. It focuses on Tendulkar's preparation and execution of an aggressive strategy that led to his dominance over Warne, particularly in the Chennai Test where he scored an unbeaten 155, ensuring India's victory.
title: When Sachin mastered Warne to set India on course of victory

description: Reliance Jio celebrates its 8th anniversary by offering special deals on select prepaid plans. The promotion runs from September 5 to September 10 and includes perks like Zomato Gold membership, OTT vouchers, and Ajio coupons. Available plans are priced at Rs 899, Rs 999, and Rs 3,599 with different data and calling benefits.
title: Jio anniversary offer: Free Zomato Gold, OTT subscription & more

description: Nykaa has taken legal action against its former Chief Business Officer, Aakash Asthana, now the CEO of Tata Cliq Luxury. The lawsuit accuses him of breaching his employment contract and attempting to recruit Nykaa employees for Tata Cliq. Nykaa seeks Rs 24 crore in compensation and a court order preventing Asthana from using confidential business data.
title: Here’s why Nykaa is suing Tata Cliq CEO Gopal Asthana

description: Muhammad Yunus, leading Bangladesh's interim government, expressed displeasure over former PM Sheikh Hasina's political remarks from India. He urged India to rethink its narrative on Bangladeshi politics and mentioned the need to review certain treaties like the Adani electricity deal. Yunus also refuted claims of violence against minorities in Bangladesh.
title: 'She has to keep quiet': Yunus's condition for India's support of Hasina

description: Rohit Sharma's trophy celebration at the T20 World Cup, mimicking Lionel Messi's famous walk, became an iconic moment in cricket history. After leading India to victory over South Africa, Rohit's gesture resonated with fans and players. This celebration has been adopted by other teams like Hayley Matthews' Barbados Royals Women, underscoring its lasting influence.
title: Rohit Sharma's iconic World Cup walk celebration recreated by ...

description: The Kerala high court is setting up a special bench to hear cases linked to the Justice K Hema committee report, which highlights harassment and exploitation of women in Mollywood. Multiple FIRs have been lodged against key film figures, leading to the formation of a special investigation team. Notable personalities are urging legislative action from the Kerala chief minister.
title: HC to constitute special bench to hear matters on Hema Committee report

description: Jasprit Bumrah's journey from playing gully cricket in Ahmedabad to becoming a standout bowler is notable. After nearly quitting cricket in 2012, he made a significant impact during the 2013 Syed Mushtaq Ali T20 tournament. His performance caught John Wright's attention, leading to his IPL debut with Mumbai Indians and eventual selection for India's national team.
title: How India discovered Jasprit Bumrah

description: A family photo featuring pro-Trump shirts worn by distant relatives of Kamala's running mate Tim Walz has gone viral due to a grammatical error. The shirts read 'Nebraska Walz’s for Trump,' with an incorrectly placed apostrophe, sparking widespread amusement and criticism online. Grammar enthusiasts quickly pointed out the mistake, turning the political moment into a humorous lesson in punctuation.
title: 'Nebraska Walz’s for Trump' shirts spark apostrophe debate, X explodes over grammar fail

description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi visited Singapore after Brunei, receiving a warm welcome from the Indian diaspora. During his visit, India and Singapore signed four MoUs focusing on digital technologies, semiconductors, health, and skills development. The bilateral relationship was elevated to a comprehensive strategic partnership aimed at boosting economic ties and collaboration in various sectors.
title: India, Singapore sign several MoUs; agree to expand trade, investment

description: Apple plans to launch four models: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Plus, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max on September 9.
title: Apple iPhone 16 series price leak online: This is how much it may cost

description: Isro Chairman S. Somanath highlighted India's gap in core technology development despite its success in IT services. Speaking at an event by cybersecurity firm SISA, he emphasized the need for indigenous software products and robust cybersecurity measures. SISA's new R&D centre aims to address these issues and foster innovation.
title: Isro chairman laments India’s lag in core IT product development

description: Rajeev Chandrashekhar of BJP took a jibe at the friendship between Congress leader Rahul Gandhi and Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin, implying it is based on a shared inclination towards scams. His comment followed an online exchange where Stalin invited Gandhi for a cycling tour in Chennai, underscoring their close relationship.
title: 'Ah that bonding ...': BJP's sarcastic jibe at Rahul-Stalin's camaraderie

description: OSOM Products, founded by ex-Essential employees, is shutting down after allegations of financial misconduct against CEO Jason Keats. A lawsuit claims Keats misused company funds for personal expenses like luxury cars and travel. Most employees will be laid off soon, with a few remaining to release a final software update for the Solana Saga smartphone.
title: This smartphone company is shutting down after CEO spent its money on racing cars

description: Mangesh Yadav, identified as the mastermind behind the daylight robbery at Bharat Jewellers in Sultanpur, was killed during an encounter with Uttar Pradesh Police's Special Task Force. Carrying a Rs 1 lakh reward for information leading to his arrest, Yadav fired upon being intercepted near Mishirpur-Puraina village and was shot in retaliatory fire before succumbing to his injuries at the hospital. The STF recovered weapons and stolen jewellery from the scene. With multiple criminal cases against him, Yadav's death leaves eleven suspects still on the run while three have been captured and one surrendered.
title: Sultanpur dacoity mastermind gunned down in encounter with UP STF

description: Six Maoists were killed by police in Telangana's Bhadradri Kothagudem district near the Chhattisgarh border during a combing operation. Two officers sustained injuries. This incident follows another encounter in Chhattisgarh where nine Maoists, including a top leader from Telangana, were eliminated, indicating ongoing efforts to suppress left-wing extremism.
title: Six Maoists killed in encounter with police in Telangana

description: A small asteroid measuring about 1 meter burned up harmlessly in Earth's atmosphere over the Philippines on Wednesday. NASA stated that the asteroid, named 2024 RW1, was discovered by astronomers in Arizona just hours before it disintegrated. These small asteroids enter Earth's atmosphere roughly every two weeks without posing any danger.
title: Small Asteroid strikes Earth, burns up in atmosphere: Here's what happened

description: Apple is gearing up to announce the iPhone 16 series at its 'Glowtime' event on September 9. The term 'Glowtime' refers to a new screen effect in iOS 18. The event will also see the introduction of macOS Sequoia. It will be held at Steve Jobs' Theatre in Cupertino and livestreamed online.
title: 10 'mockup photos' of iPhone 16 series that claim to show new colours and design

description: JPMorgan Chase & Co has shifted its stance on Chinese stocks from overweight to neutral, driven by concerns over potential US election volatility and China's economic issues. The bank advises investors to consider reallocating funds to other emerging markets like India, Mexico, and Brazil. This move follows similar downgrades by UBS Global and Nomura Holdings Inc.
title: JPMorgan abandons its recommendation to buy China stocks

description: Kapil Dev's unbeaten 175 against Zimbabwe during the 1983 World Cup remains legendary. Entering at a precarious 17 for 5, Kapil's aggressive play led India to a total of 266/8. India went on to win the match by 31 runs, bowling out Zimbabwe for 235. In the final, India famously defeated the mighty West Indies by 43 runs to lift their first-ever World Cup trophy.
title: 'My towel fell down': 'Secret' story from 1983 WC
National Teachers’ Awards 2024: Meet India's top 50 educators; full list

description: India pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah is lauded by former cricket greats for his pace, accuracy, and yorkers. His pivotal role in India's T20 World Cup win is highlighted, earning him the Player of the Tournament title. Legends like Chris Gayle and Wasim Akram commend his unique skills. Bumrah becomes the first bowler to rank Number One across all formats.
title: 'Top of the ladder...': Cricket greats hail Jasprit Bumrah - Watch

description: A school shooting at Apalachee high school in Winder, Georgia, claimed four lives and injured nine others. The suspect, 14-year-old Colt Gray, is in custody while authorities investigate the motive. President Biden and other leaders have expressed sorrow over the tragedy and called for action against gun violence.
title: 'He shot at least 10 times': Students recall moments of terror in Georgia shooting

description: Bangladesh secured a six-wicket victory over Pakistan in the second Test at Rawalpindi, leading to Pakistan's first-ever series loss against Bangladesh. This defeat affects Pakistan's hopes for the World Test Championship (WTC) 2025 final. To qualify, they must win all upcoming matches and monitor other teams' performances closely. As per WTC rules, the top two teams qualify for the final.
title: How Pakistan can qualify for WTC Final

description: Amazon Alexa devices suggested supporting Kamala Harris over Donald Trump because of a software bug. Amazon confirmed and fixed the issue, describing it as an error. This problem affected various Alexa models, prompting immediate action from the company to resolve it swiftly.
title: Video: "Amazon Alexa is a Commie ... ", wants people to vote for Kamala Harris

description: During his visit to Indonesia, Pope Francis praised the nation for its larger families compared to countries that favor pets over children. Addressing this issue alongside President Joko Widodo in Jakarta, he encouraged Indonesians to continue setting an example. His remarks reflect similar sentiments expressed earlier about Europe's demographic issues.
title: 'Keep it up': Pope Francis praises Indonesians for having '4-5 kids over dogs, cats'

description: Lyela Sayarath provides an account of the moments before Colt Gray's shooting at Apalachee High School. Known for his quiet nature and frequent absences, Gray left algebra class only to return with a gun. The incident resulted in the death of 14-year-old Mason Schermerhorn and injuries to nine others before Gray surrendered.
title: Georgia school shooting: Colt Gray described as ‘quiet student who never really talked’ by survivor before he opened fire at Apalachee High

description: Not just teachers, anybody who helped you or is still guiding you in your life path, deserves a special mention on this day. Whether you are a student, a teacher, or a professional, sharing thoughtful wishes and messages can brighten someone's day. So, here are some of the wishes and messages you can share with your colleagues, teachers, boss, students, and friends on this special day.
title: Happy Teachers Day: Best 30+ wishes and messages to share with your loved ones

description: The article delves into the role of astrology, numerology, and other occult sciences in identifying a child's potential for a teaching career. It outlines common birth numbers, name initials, and zodiac signs that correlate with teaching abilities. The analysis serves as a guide for parents to nurture their children's educational inclinations.
title: Teachers' Day 2024: Kids born on these dates most likely to become teachers

description: Sonu, a Zomato delivery agent in Delhi, is receiving praise for managing work while caring for his two-year-old daughter. Devendra Mehra from Starbucks shared this heartwarming story on LinkedIn.
title: Starbucks manager applauds Zomato delivery agent carrying 2-year-old daughter to work

description: Sunil Gavaskar humorously narrated an incident from an India-Pakistan Test match in Bangalore on Kapil Sharma's show a few years back. Javed Miandad, known for his psychological tactics, repeatedly asked an Indian spinner for his room number during the game.
title: When Gavaskar & Kirmani wondered why Miandad was doing this

description: Recent rainfall has significantly improved air quality in Delhi and surrounding areas. Nazafgarh reported an AQI of 25, a rare occurrence for the city. Overall, Delhi's AQI was at a satisfactory level of 76. Areas such as Ashok Vihar and Patparganj also showed improvement. However, Anand Vihar continued to face moderate air quality challenges with an AQI of 102.
title: Delhi breathes easy: Weeklong rainfall cleans up city's air, Nazafgarh clocks 25 on AQI

description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has emphasized the need for Donald Trump to win the US elections to preserve freedom and meritocracy. Following an assassination attempt on Trump, Musk compared him to Theodore Roosevelt and criticized Kamala Harris. He also contributed financially to a super PAC supporting Trump's campaign, showcasing his growing political influence.
title: 'Civilization is on the line': Musk on why Trump should win US elections

description: Ireland cricketer Simi Singh, originally from Punjab, is critically ill with acute liver failure and is in the ICU at Medanta, Gurugram. Awaiting a liver transplant with his wife as the donor, Singh has been an important player for Ireland since his debut in 2017, achieving significant milestones in both ODIs and T20Is.
title: India-born Ireland cricketer Simranjit Singh battling for life

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu announced that Israel will not vacate the Gaza border corridor until there are guarantees against its use by Hamas for smuggling weapons. He stressed the need for consistent prevention measures. The US is formulating a new ceasefire proposal, but Hamas has rejected all aspects of it so far.
title: 'Will not leave Gaza border until ...': Netanyahu sets conditions for ceasefire

description: "If we were to direct CBFC to release the certificate without considering objections, we would effectively be directing CBFC to breach the order of another HC. Judicial propriety demands such a course should always be avoided. Considering these circumstances, we are of the view, as on date, we are unable to direct CBFC to release the certificate as sought for by the petitioner"
title: No immediate relief from HC on Kangana Ranaut's Emergency: Key pointers

description: Two loggers were killed, two went missing, and one was injured after an attack by the Mashco Piro Indigenous tribe in the Peruvian Amazon. The incident reflects growing tensions between loggers and Indigenous tribes. Rights group FENAMAD calls for urgent government protection, highlighting prior warnings about potential violence.
title: 'Uncontacted' tribe kills two loggers with bow and arrows in Peru

description: Priti Patel has been eliminated from the Conservative Party leadership race, securing only 14 votes in the first round. Robert Jenrick leads with 28 votes, followed by Kemi Badenoch with 22. The remaining candidates will face another vote next week before a final decision at the party conference.
title: British Indian Priti Patel eliminated in first round of Conservative Party leader race

description: Tech companies laid off over 27,000 workers in August 2024, affecting more than 40 firms like Intel, IBM, Cisco, and startups. Intel announced 15,000 job cuts, Cisco laid off 6,000 employees, while IBM shut down its R&D in China. Companies like Brave, ShareChat, and ReshaMandi also announced reductions.
title: Tech layoffs cross 27,000 in August: Intel, IBM, Apple & others cuts thousands of jobs

description: Teachers' Day is celebrated annually on September 5 in India to honour educators. This day commemorates the birth anniversary of Dr. Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan. Here are messages, quotes, and wishes to express gratitude towards teachers for their dedication and significant impact on students' lives.
title: Happy Teachers Day 2024: Images, greetings, quotes, wishes and messages

description: ENTOD Pharmaceuticals has secured final approval from the Drug Controller General of India for PresVu eye drops, which aim to lessen dependence on reading glasses for those suffering from presbyopia. This approval signifies a notable advancement in addressing this age-related vision problem. The eye drops employ advanced technology to ensure consistent effectiveness and safety over prolonged use.
title: Nod to eye drops that'll help skip reading glasses

description: Big Brother 26's Head of Household Quinn Martin faced a challenging decision after Leah Peters used the Power of Veto. Forced to nominate a replacement, Quinn chose his ally Joseph Rodriguez, surprising many. This eviction is critical as it marks the final pre-jury eviction, influencing who remains in the game and impacts future decisions.
title: Big Brother 26: Quinn's choice for Post-replacement nominee leaves netizens shocked

description: Significant taxes were paid by top Indian cricketers for FY 2023-24. Virat Kohli is the highest taxpayer among sports persons, contributing Rs 66 crore. MS Dhoni and Sachin Tendulkar are No. 2 and 3 in the list or cricketers with Rs 38 crore and Rs 28 crore respectively. Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan leads the overall list with a tax payment of Rs 92 crore.
title: Which Indian cricketer paid the most income tax in 2023-24
